metadata.synopsis: Dialog with a group of prisoners in Cazador's Palace when Astarion is not in the party.Also triggered when Astarion is in the party and you already had an Origin Moment with him at this place.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Cells

12.speaker: Sebastian
12.context: InternalNodeContext: OM happened, Astarion escaped the grapple without attacking the prisoner.

17.speaker: Sebastian
17.text: Please, go. Do whatever you have to.
17.context: InternalNodeContext: OM happened, Astarion escaped the grapple without attacking the prisoner.

18.speaker: Sebastian
18.text: Please, help us. We just want to be free.

35.speaker: Sebastian
35.text: You haven't seen his rage. You don't know what he can do.

42.speaker: Sebastian
42.text: Don't leave us. You can't leave us!

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *Hollow-eyed faces stare out of the cells. Some meet your eyes, but most look away. There's an almost physical stink of decay and neglect.*

67.speaker: Player
67.text: I'm a friend. Who are you?

51.speaker: Sebastian
51.text: Sebastian. I'm - I was - I'm not sure. It was all so long ago.

13.speaker: Sebastian
13.text: The last thing I remember, I was drinking with a pale, beautiful elf. We laughed, we kissed, we stumbled back to this palace, and then...

32.speaker: Sebastian
32.text: Then it gets so dark. I woke up here. Like this.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: What am I? What are you?!

0.speaker: Sebastian
0.text: I don't know. But I'm hungry.

11.speaker: Sebastian
11.text: I've been hungry for so, so long...

16.speaker: Sebastian
16.text: Please, you shouldn't be here. He'll find you. And he won't kill you.

29.speaker: Sebastian
29.text: He won't ever let you die.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: *Under the grime, you can see how pale he is. You can see the hunger in his eyes - in all of their eyes. Each one is an emaciated, starving vampire spawn.*

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *Under the grime, you can see how pale he is. You can see the hunger in his eyes - in all of their eyes. Each one is an emaciated, starving vampire spawn.*

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: *Under the grime, you can see how pale he is. You can see the hunger in his eyes - in all of their eyes. Each one is an emaciated, starving vampire spawn.*

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *More than that, you can see that each prisoner is marked with a scar - the same as one of the runes from Astarion's back.*

55.speaker: Narrator
55.text: *More than that, you can see that each prisoner is marked with a scar - a rune carved into their flesh.*

20.text: That scar on your face - what does it mean?

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: That scar on your face - what does it mean?

50.speaker: Player
50.text: That scar on your face - what does it mean?

23.speaker: Sebastian
23.text: He carved it himself - said it bound me to his ascension.

54.speaker: Sebastian
54.text: I don't know what that means. I don't know what any of this means...

52.speaker: Player
52.text: How long has it been since you fed?

27.speaker: Sebastian
27.text: He never fed us. All we've ever known is hunger.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I'm going to help you. I'm going to kill Cazador.

61.speaker: Sebastian
61.text: And then? What happens to us?

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Just tell me where to find him. I'll do the rest.

9.speaker: Sebastian
9.text: But even if you can kill him - what then? What happens to us?

28.speaker: Player
28.text: I'll set you free - what else?

1.speaker: Sebastian
1.text: Free from this nightmare? It doesn't feel possible...

31.speaker: Sebastian
31.text: Whatever you do, just do it quickly. I can't go on like this...

64.speaker: Player
64.text: That depends on you. Can you control your hunger?

38.speaker: Sebastian
38.text: I - I don't know. It's all I've ever felt...

56.speaker: Sebastian
56.text: I'll try. I promise I'll try.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: What do you want to happen?

39.speaker: Sebastian
39.text: I don't know. I just don't want to die down here. Please...

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I have no intention of freeing a bunch of ravenous spawn.

40.speaker: Sebastian
40.text: No - no, you can't leave us here. Not now - not like this!

10.speaker: Player
10.text: How do I open your cell? Does he have the key?

22.speaker: Sebastian
22.text: His staff - it controls everything down here.

63.speaker: Sebastian
63.text: But he never sets it down - you'll never get it.

36.speaker: Sebastian
36.text: His staff - it controls everything down here.

15.speaker: Sebastian
15.text: You can't stop him. No one can stop him.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: The elf that brought you here - what was his name?

33.speaker: Sebastian
33.text: He called me so many sweet things. My name sounded like music on his tongue.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: How did this happen to you?

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Where are the keys to your cells?

62.speaker: Sebastian
62.text: He'll find you, you know. And he won't kill you.

48.speaker: Sebastian
48.text: Please, no more. I can't take any more.
48.context: NodeContext: Broken by trauma and fear

53.speaker: Sebastian
53.context: InternalNodeContext: OM happened, prisoner pissed at AstarionNodeContext: Small voice, lost in his own head, still cursing Astarion

66.speaker: Sebastian
66.text: I just want to breathe free air one last time...
